epic.title: Ralph E2E Orchestration Hub
epic.description: Orchestrator for canonical sequential epics (A -> B). Plan: .devagent/workspace/tests/ralph-e2e/orchestration/plan/canonical-orchestration-plan.md

setupTasks.title: Run Setup & PR Finalization
setupTasks.objective: Prepare the working branch, create or update PR, and ensure all prerequisites are in place for the loop execution.
acceptance_criteria: Working branch exists and is checked out
PR created or updated with appropriate title and description
All prerequisites verified (epic exists, config validated)

teardownTasks.title: Generate Epic Revise Report
teardownTasks.objective: Generate the final revise report aggregating all revision learnings, commits, and quality gate results from the epic execution.
acceptance_criteria: All child tasks are closed or blocked
Report includes all revision learnings and commits
Epic status updated appropriately based on task completion

tasks.title: Sync Loop Config
tasks.objective: Synchronize the orchestrator loop config into Beads tasks using setup-loop.ts.
